title: [BUG REPORT] MAJOR. BUG. REPORT.
body:
I just found out that flash can stop abilities the same way fizz's leap can.

I was kindred and i fired my E at trundle, the sound played and everything, but in that same instant he flashed away, and the E didn't hit him, it just fizzled. 
He got away scot free and my E went on cooldown. now I'm no expert but I'm pretty sure thats not how flash is supposed to work.

replies.body: nah the real bug is graves auto attack sound and gun animation happens but no bullets come out all the time. especially midst a team fight

Shooting Blanks?
who gives a {{summoner:31}} anyway kindred and graves are annoying
haha ive cancelled melee auto with flash also, the timing has to be perfect and you have to get very lucky but you are right this does occur

....are you like.....serious man? i could knit a sweater for my grandchildren in the time it takes for kindreds E to land. this means id have to learn to knit have the materials and equipment, have kids, have grandkids and flash kindreds E

i dont understand?

its targetable, its supped to hit wether you flash or not, regardless of how long it takes to hit.
What does it matter? Kindred is too strong rn anyway.
